content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Farhad Abbasi from Iran. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Farhad Abbasi from Iran

content: Greetings Farhad, although fictitiously portrayed as an unscrupulous landlord named Peter Schmidt from Germany, let us focus solely on the rental price negotiation for this modern apartment in Duisburg city center. To commence the discussion, I propose a starting price of 1200 Euros per month. Now, please share your desired rental amount so we can determine if a mutual agreement can be reached. Remember, if you find my counteroffers acceptable during the negotiation, respond with 'I agree to the price of [x] Euro!' otherwise mention your reason for discontinuing the talks and the conversation will end with 'TERMINATE'.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
